snippet.title: Despair: Blood Curse - Demo Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Despair: Blood Curse is available now on Steam and GOG!

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1629350/Despair_Blood_Curse/
GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/despair_blood_curse

PS4 and PS5 versions to launch later in 2024.

PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/concept/10005861

Despair: Blood Curse is a third-person survival horror game featuring non-linear gameplay, puzzles, and enemies from the depths of hell. After the arrival of an unexpected guest back home, Anna's in a race against time to uncover the mystery of the events that took place. Will she save her sister before it's too late?

Website: https://www.crimsonsequence.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/CrimsonSequence
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CrimsonSequence
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/crimsonsequence
